CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 23, 1961, pg. A16 reads: "Delta Contestants -These four lovely young women met at the home of Delta Soror Nancy Lee, last Sunday, for final chats concerning the Ebony Fashion Fair to be presented Saturday night (Sept. 23) at 8 P.M. at the Pittsburgh-Hilton Hotel.  Seated are Geraldine Ballard and Mary Sandidge.  Standing: Fay Drake and Barbara Bryant. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four Delta Sorority contestants, seated; Geraldine Ballard and Mary Sandidge, standing; Fay Drake and Barbara Bryant, posed outdoors in front of tall hedge
